errors.error_description: Incorrect command syntax for installing pipx using pip instead of python -m pip install --user pipx
Wrong order of commands - running pipx ensurepath before installing pipx
correction_candidates: Run pip install pipx first, then python -m pipx ensurepath
Install pipx with python -m pip install --user pipx before running python -m pipx ensurepath
Execute python -m pipx ensurepath after pipx installation is complete
Ensure pipx is installed before configuring PATH with python -m pipx ensurepath
errors.golden_answer: Install pipx with python -m pip install --user pipx before running python -m pipx ensurepath
